          <title>
            <string language="en">Reactions of iron, sodium and copper with chlorine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktionen des Eisens, des Natriums und des

            <string language="en">This illustration shows the reactions of iron, sodium and copper metals with chlorine gas.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as reações de metais do
